Package com.example.luckydragon.Controllers

Class EventController

java.lang.Object
com.example.luckydragon.Controllers.Controller
com.example.luckydragon.Controllers.EventController
public class EventController extends Controller
This class is a controller for the EventActivity. Handles Entrants accepting/declining invitations or joining/leaving a waitlist and updating the Event model correspondingly. It also handles updating the model if a Admin deletes an event or removes the QR code.
